title: Investigate DDoS Attack on Game Login Server
description: The system alerts that a game's login server is under a DDoS attack, preventing players from logging in.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the DDoS alert and analyze traffic patterns to the login server.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a high volume of traffic from a botnet is targeting the server.

tasks.description: Activate DDoS mitigation services to filter the malicious traffic.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enables the DDoS protection service, which begins to drop the attack traffic.

tasks.description: Monitor the server status until it returns to normal operation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent watches the server load and confirms that legitimate players can log in again.
